subject: Show indeterminate state for tool/skill category checkboxes
description: UI bug: ToolSelector/SkillSelector pass data-state but Checkbox only respects checked/indeterminate via Radix. Set checked to 'indeterminate' when some items selected, or set aria-checked + styling so partial selection is visible. Update packages/web/src/components/agents/ToolSelector.tsx and SkillSelector.tsx.
